text: "Livin La Pura Vida" is the seventh episode of 31st season of The Simpsons. It was first shown on November 17, 2019. In The episode Marge becomes obsessed with getting the perfect vacation photo when the Simpson family are finally invited on the Van Houten's annual trip to Costa Rica, while Lisa becomes worried they can't afford it and Homer befriends Patty's new girlfriend, Evelyn The episodes was directed by Timothy Bailey, written by Brian Kelley and guest starred Fortune Feimster as Evelyn. Category:2019 television episodes
title: Livin La Pura Vida
